tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tumors (
  tumor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tumor_size DECIMAL,
  tumor_type VARCHAR(50),
  tumor_location VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_plan TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Tumor_Characteristics(
    tumor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    tumor_size DECIMAL,
    tumor_type VARCHAR(50),
    tumor_location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Treatment_Plans(
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_description TEXT,
    plan_date DATE,
    planned_by VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE TumorImages (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_data BYTES,
    patient_id UUID,
    tumor_size FLOAT,
    tumor_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE TumorCharacteristics (
    tumor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    tumor_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    tumor_size FLOAT NOT NULL,
    tumor_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    tumor_grade INT
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentPlan (
    plan_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    treatment_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ImageAnalysis (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT NOT NULL,
    analysis_result TEXT NOT NULL,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    analysis_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE tumors (
    tumor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    image_id INT NOT NULL,
    tumor_type VARCHAR(50),
    tumor_size FLOAT,
    tumor_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE images (
    image_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    image_name VARCHAR(100),
    image_type VARCHAR(50),
    image_resolution VARCHAR(20),
    capture_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    age INT,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(200),
    admission_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
    treatment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    treatment_type VARCHAR(50),
    treatment_date DATE,
    treatment_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE doctors (
    doctor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(100),
    specialization VARCHAR(50),
    hospital_name VARCHAR(100),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15),
    email VARCHAR(100)
);
